q1: Where do the exchange rates come from?
a1: We use the Frankfurter API which provides rates from the European Central Bank. Rates are updated daily on business days.
a2: We support 30 major world currencies including USD, EUR, GBP, JPY, CHF, CAD, AUD, CNY, INR, BRL, and 20 more.
a3: Rates are updated daily from the European Central Bank. For real-time trading rates, consult a financial institution.
q4: What happens if the API is unavailable?
a4: If live rates cannot be fetched, the converter falls back to approximate offline rates so you can still get estimates.
